columns.Singer_ID: A unique identifier assigned to each singer in the database.
columns.Name: The full name of the singer.
columns.Birth_Year: The year in which the singer was born.
columns.Net_Worth_Millions: The estimated net worth of the singer in millions of currency units.
columns.Citizenship: The country of citizenship of the singer.

singer.table_description: The singer table contains information about individual singers, including their unique identifiers, names, birth years, estimated net worth, and citizenship status.

columns.Song_ID: A unique identifier for each song in the database.
columns.Title: The name of the song as recorded in the database.
columns.Singer_ID: A reference identifier for the singer of the song, linking it to the singer table.
columns.Sales: The total number of sales achieved by the song, representing its commercial success.
columns.Highest_Position: The highest rank achieved by the song on music charts, indicating its popularity.

song.table_description: The song table contains information about individual songs, including their titles, associated singers, sales figures, and chart performance.
